title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.61 - Direction of banking board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.61 - Direction of banking board

State Regulations

The Banking Board, upon recommendation of the
superintendent, may direct by a three-fifths vote of all its members the
termination of any mutual trust investment company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.61

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
